bookstore.book: *** O'Brien, Tim MSXML3: A Comprehensive Guide Computer 36.95 2000-12-01 The Microsoft MSXML3 parser is covered in detail, with attention to XML DOM interfaces, XSLT processing, SAX and more.

book.author: Galos, Mike
book.title: Visual Studio 7: A Comprehensive Guide
book.last_description: ***Microsoft Visual Studio 7 is explored in depth, looking at how Visual Basic, Visual C++, C#, and ASP+ are integrated into a comprehensive development environment.
